name: Ottem
description:
Welcome to Ottem

A few centuries ago, the indians found another totems use, and they invented a new game : it is called Ottem.
The goal is simple, keep in balance a totem as long as possible without going out of bounds.
But what the indians didn't know is that this game was already played in other ancient civilizations.

To play, nothing simpler:
Press on the right or the left of the screen to balance the totem, but be careful, the wind could set a trap for you.
Features:
-Use Ottem Ingots to unlock up to 11 characters.
-Share your score with your friends via Game center and socials networks.
